channel.title: Omg im lost in need help
channel.description:
Hey all, i was making a own server, i first used Hamachi but that was kinda stink:P now i want to make one from my IP adress but i got a lan and i can not connect to my router because some1 changed the pass of it and i dont want to reset it because my dad will kill me if i do it. is someone there who can help me? i asked many people to help but they always say no
thanks alot !:)

item.title: Omg im lost in need help
item.dc:creator: @Quintentje Quintentje
item.description:
@Quintentje wrote:

hmm i did it on a other way i think.
i went to Command Prompt and used IPconfig
i used the ip what showed up and now i can also connect and wont need to use 0.0.0.0 ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Omg im lost in need help

what if your router wont let you portforward?

item.title: Omg im lost in need help
item.dc:creator: @junior631 junior631
item.description:
@junior631 wrote:

No it isn’t possible.

Btw turn your router up side down and on the bottom it should say the ID/PASS try it =)

item.title: Omg im lost in need help
item.dc:creator: @Quintentje Quintentje
item.description:
@Quintentje wrote:

Hmm i already thought on that thanks anyways but how u want to do it ? and is it also available to portforward a lan trought www.portforwarding.com?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2009, 09:14:10 am[/size][hr][quote=“Rockin, post:2, topic:265537”]Maybe find another person to host for you?

All I can really think of.[/quote]

can you host for me :P?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2009, 10:28:04 am[/size][hr]I think i solve my problem, im using my IP adress now.

Read full topic
